charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_1101_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Mina and Misty
having a chat.
charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_1201_0: We were talking about the oceans around Pasio!

Pasio’s oceans are so beautiful, I come here to
swim almost every day!

Back in Kanto, I used to go to swimming in the
sea near Vermilion City.

Sometimes you just wanna jump out of the
confines of a pool and swim in the vast,
open sea!
I really like the color of the sea in Kanto!

But I think what I like best are the colors of the
ocean back home on Poni Island.

There’s a lot of stories about the ocean
around Poni.
charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_0402_1: OK, I’ve got a good story to share.
charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_1201_1:
There once was a little girl who lived on
Poni Island.

The ocean around Poni is beautiful, but it also
has a lot of dangerous spots.

The adults always tell children not to go out
to the ocean alone.

She didn’t listen to those warnings, and she started
sneaking out to visit the ocean.

One day, she went near a rough coastline that
was dangerous even for adults.
charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_1201_2:
The little girl got caught up in watching the waves
crashing, creating pillars of ocean spray...
And she accidentally slipped and fell in.

She panicked and struggled to stay afloat in the
rough waters...
But she soon ran out of breath and was done for!

...Or so she thought. But then she felt
a presence.
What a relief! Someone came to her rescue?

Yup! And the one who saved that little girl was
Tapu Fini, Poni Island’s guardian deity!

Later, the little girl was found unconscious on
the shore.

She got scolded big time by the Island Kahuna
and both her parents.

Everyone must’ve been worried. I’m glad she
was OK.
charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_1201_3:
I’m sure Tapu Fini was also trying to teach her the
hard way that the ocean is dangerous.

That little girl never forgot that Tapu Fini rescued
her that day...

And now, she has permission to clean the
ruins and put out offerings.

I’m so happy I became a sync pair with a
Pokémon like Tapu Fini here on Pasio.

My partner’s different from the Tapu Fini that’s the
guardian of Poni Island, though.
charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_0301_3: You must’ve met for a reason.
charaepi_ch0034_10_matsurika/2301_1201_4:
Next time, you should tell us one of your stories
about the ocean, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
